text:
@realDonaldTrump @POTUS #TRUMP, If #COVID19 is not a threat, Why the spacing?
Why force the United States Armed Forces into quarantine?
Ohhhhh, Right, 

🚨115 THOUSAND 📍DEAD📍 AMERICANS, 
....and counting!

#WearTheMask #COVID #USA #TrumpLiesPeopleDie 
SHAME on @GOP @SenateGOP @Whitehouse @PressSec
